name: Prototype N
storyline: Destructive robots are running rampant across the world! Nadine, an incomplete prototype robot of unknown origin, fights to save the world while searching for her creator.
summary:
Prototype N is a side scrolling shooting platformer. The player must help Nadine get through many stages of tricky obstacles such as dangerous robotic foes, hazardous traps and more!

Nadine, equpped with her arm cannon, can shoot her way through the levels found in the game. While she is equipped with a little plasma shooter, there are several exciting weapons spread throughout the levels. Each have their own unique properities and interact with enemies and the environment in different ways.
